abstract: NTT DoCoMo, Japan’s top wireless operator, is easing the pace of its M&A activity in Asia as it focuses on existing acquisitions, an executive told Reuters.
snippet: NTT DoCoMo, Japan’s top wireless operator, is easing the pace of its M&A activity in Asia as it focuses on existing acquisitions, an executive told Reuters.
lead_paragraph: NTT DoCoMo, Japan’s top wireless operator, is easing the pace of its merger and acquisition activity in Asia as it focuses on existing acquisitions, an executive told Reuters.

headline.main: In Asia, DoCoMo Slows Its Shopping Spree
